albedo.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

alhaitham.desc: 0 for normal low plunge (default), 1 for short low plunge. The short version is 20 frames shorter.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg. Does not apply to low_plunge from skill[hold=1].
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

aloy.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
Number of Chillwater Bomblets to spawn. Default 2 bomblets.
Determines when Chillwater Bomblets start exploding after projectile hits. Default 0 frames.

amber.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
Shoot the first bunny (for C2+ only). Default 0 (false). Arrow does no damage if 1 (true).
Frames to hold bunny for (for throwing). Default 0 frames.

ayaka.desc: Number of frames to add to minimum dash length. Default 0 frames.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

ayato.desc: Illusion explosion delay in frames. Default 35 frames.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

barbara.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

beidou.desc: Number of counter hits. Default 0. 2 for perfect counter. Does not affect frames.

bennett.desc: 0 for Tap (default), 1 for Hold Lv. 1, 2 for Hold Lv. 2.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

candace.desc: 0 for no A1 (default), non-zero value for A1. This sets hold to 1.

charlotte.desc: 0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 809 for Hold. The number determines the E duration in frames.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

chevreuse.desc: 0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 301 for Hold. The number determines the E duration in frames.

collei.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

cyno.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

dehya.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

diluc.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

diona.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

dori.desc: Projectile travel time for Troubleshooter Shot. Default 10 frames.
Projectile travel time for Jinni Toop. Default 10 frames.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

faruzan.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

fischl.desc: Projectile travel time for Oz. Default 10 frames. Set via '+params=[oz_travel=...]' in Fischl's 'char' line.
0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
0 to use E (default), 1 to use Recast E. Recast E is only possible if Oz is active and Recast E is not on cooldown.

ganyu.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot, 2 for Frostflake Arrow (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

gorou.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

heizou.desc: Hold until max stacks. Default 0 (false), non-zero value for true.

itto.desc: Number of stacks gained via Ushi getting hit. Max 3 stacks. Stacks are gained at random points during Ushi uptime while respecting 2s stack gain cooldown. Default 0.
Whether to grant a stack from performing N1 right before Q. 0 for no prestack, 1 for prestack. Default 0.

jean.desc: Number of times enemies enter or leave the field. Default 0 times.
Time between enter/leave hits. Default 600 / enter (frames).
0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 300 for Hold. Triggering C1 requires hold >= 60.

kazuha.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no Glide Cancel (default), 1 for Glide Cancel. Using high_plunge after Skill with a Glide Cancel is not allowed.

kirara.desc: 0 for Tap (default), 1 for Short Hold. The Short Hold version is the shortest possible Hold.
0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 600 for Hold. The number determines the E duration in frames.
Number of mines that hit. Default 2 hits.
Time until all mines explode. Default 180 frames.

klee.desc: Number of bounce hits. Default 1 hit.
Number of mines hits. Default 2 hits.
Time until all mines explode. Default 240 frames.
0 for Skill cancel (relevant for 4pc Crimson Witch stacks), 1 for Skill (default).

layla.desc: Projectile travel time for Starlight Slugs. Default 22 frames.

lynette.desc: 0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 150 for Hold. The number determines the E duration in frames.
Projectile travel time for Vivid Shots. Default 15 frames.

lyney.desc: Projectile travel time for Pyrotechnic Strike via Grin-Malkin Hat expiry. Default 36 frames. Set via '+params=[pyrotechnic_travel=...]' in Lyney's 'char' line.
Number of C2 stacks to gain at the beginning. Default 0, maximum 3. Set via '+params=[c2_stacks=...]' in Lyney's 'char' line.
0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot, 2 for Prop Arrow (default).
Projectile travel time for C6. Default 10 frames. Only does something if level is 1.
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

mona.desc: Number of frames to add to minimum dash length. Default 0 frames.

nahida.desc: 0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 300 for Hold. The number is added to the minimum holding frames for Tap to turn into Hold (16).

navia.desc: 0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 241 for Hold. The number is added to the minimum holding frames for Tap to turn into Hold (41), subtracted by 1 to account for requiring a 1 to activate.

nilou.desc: Projectile travel time for Luminous Illusion. Default 0 frames.

ningguang.desc: If 1, destroy the Jade Screen on cast. Default 0.
Number of Jade attacks from burst. Default 6.
Number of Jade attacks from Jade Screen snapshot. Default 6.

noelle.desc: Number of seconds to extend Burst by. Value must be between 0 and 10. Default 10.

rosaria.desc: Default 0. 1 for disabling striking behind for A1 purposes.

sara.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

sayu.desc: 0 for Tap (default), 1 for Short Hold. The Short Hold version is the shortest possible Hold.
0 for Tap (default), value between 1 and 600 for Hold. The number determines the E duration in frames.

tartaglia.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
Hit weakspot for Charge Attack in Melee mode. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

tighnari.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default), 2 for Wreath Arrow. If his E state is active, then hold is 2 by default.
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
Projectile travel time for Clusterbloom Arrows from when the Wreath Arrow hits. Only available if level is 1. Default 35 frames.

venti.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.

xiangling.desc: Number of frames until the active character picks up the Chili Pepper (A4) relative to Guoba Expiry. A negative value indicates that it is not picked up. Default -1, maximum 600.

wanderer.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

xiao.desc: 0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.
0 for no collision dmg (default), 1 for collision dmg.

yelan.desc: 0 for no Breakthrough state at start of sim, 1 (default) for Breakthrough state at start of sim. Set via '+params=[breakthrough=...]' in Yelan's 'char' line.
0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
Number of enemies to mark with the Lifeline. Default 1.

yoimiya.desc: 0 for Physical Aimed Shot, 1 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (default), 2/3/4 for Fully-Charged Aimed Shot (1/2/3 Kindling Arrow).
Hit weakspot with aimed shot. Default 0 (false), 1 for true.
Kindling Arrow travel time. Default 30 frames.

yunjin.desc: 0 for Tap (default), 1 for Hold Lv. 1, 2 for Hold Lv. 2.
If 1, perform perfect counter (Hold Lv. 2 frames). Default 0.

zhongli.desc: If 1, no Stone Stele will be created (i.e. shield only) and Hold will be performed. Default 0.

travelergeo.desc: 0 for no +3 base atk, 1 (default) for +3 base atk. Set via '+params=[base_atk_buff=...]' in the char's line.
0 for Tap (default), 1 for Short Hold. The Short Hold version is the shortest possible Hold.
If 1, no meteorite will be created. Default 0.
Number of shockwave attacks to perform. Default 4.
Number of Stone Walls to spawn. Default 4. Using a value < 4 starts not spawning Stone Walls starting from top left going counterclockwise.

travelerelectro.desc: 0 for no +3 base atk, 1 (default) for +3 base atk. Set via '+params=[base_atk_buff=...]' in the char's line.
Number of times Thunder Shadow hits. Default 1, maximum 3.
Customize limit for number of Abudance Amulets generated. Default limit is 2/3 if C0/C1+, maximum is capped by the default limits.
Delay until Abundance Amulets are picked up by the active character. Default 107 frames, minimum 107 frames.

traveleranemo.desc: 0 for no +3 base atk, 1 (default) for +3 base atk. Set via '+params=[base_atk_buff=...]' in the char's line.
Number of ticks for Hold E. Default 6, maximum 6. Only works if hold = 1.

travelerhydro.desc: 0 for no +3 base atk, 1 (default) for +3 base atk. Set via '+params=[base_atk_buff=...]' in the char's line.
Number of ticks for Hold E. Default 22, maximum 22, minimum 0. Only works if hold = 1. If 0, then a shorter version of Tap will be performed.
Projectile travel time. Default 6 frames. Only works if hold = 1.
Number of picked up Sourcewater Droplets. Default 0.

travelerdendro.desc: 0 for no +3 base atk, 1 (default) for +3 base atk. Set via '+params=[base_atk_buff=...]' in the char's line.

neuvillette.desc: 0 for Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment (default), 1 for Charged Attack. Charged Attack will still absorb droplets if possible. This mirrors in game behaviour.

Number of ticks for Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment. Default is maximum number of ticks, minimum 1. Only works if short = 0. If the number of ticks is not the maximum, the next action must be Burst, Skill, Dash, or Jump.
